Name: Patrón City Lights
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions:
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and TOP with soda.

Nathan uses salted Peychaud's Bitters which he makes with Maldon salt (10g of Maldon salt to one bottle of Peychaud's Bitters).
Review: Created by Nathan Shearer of Callooh Callay , for Patrón Tequila at London Cocktail Week 2016.
Nutrition: One serving of Patrón City Lights contains 182 calories
